--- File name : ident.lua.txt
--- DateTime : 2021/10/22
--- Description : 
---

local tostring = tostring
---@class ident
---@field svrid number
---@field index number
local ident = {}
ident.__index = ident

---new
---@public
---@param svrid number
---@param index number
---@return ident
function ident.new(svrid, index)
    local instance = {
        svrid = svrid,
        index = index,
    }
    return setmetatable(instance, ident)
end

---比较
---@private
---@param a ident
---@param b ident
local eq_function = function(a, b)
    return a.svrid == b.svrid and a.index == b.index
end

---比较
---@private
---@param t ident
local tostring_function = function(t)
    return tostring(t.svrid) .. '_' .. tostring(t.index)
end

---@private
ident.__eq = eq_function
---@private
ident.__tostring = tostring_function

---包装
---@public
---@param uid Ident
---@return ident
function ident.wrap(uid)
    if uid == nil or uid.svrid == nil or uid.index == nil then
        return nil
    else
        return setmetatable(uid, ident)
    end
end

return ident
